name: limitus
description: Limitus makes rate limiting your anything a snap.

scripts.test: node node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test --recursive && node node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint lib
scripts.travis: node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- test --recursive

author: Connor Peet <connor@peet.io>
